name: HURLEY 22R
notes:
After Hurley Marine went out of business, the boat was built by South Coast Marine and then Ravensail. Ravensail called their version the HURLEY 22R. Some have bilge (twin) keels and some have a standard fin keel.
Thanks to Nick Vass and the Hurley Owner Assoc. (site listed above) for images and information about all Hurley models.
